scoringPlays.text: Darrin Hall 41 Yd Run (Alex Kessman Kick)
Terrell Jana 42 Yd pass from Bryce Perkins (Brian Delaney Kick)
Darrin Hall 2 Yd Run (Alex Kessman Kick)
Darrin Hall 75 Yd Run (Alex Kessman PAT failed)

videos.headline: Pitt RB escapes for 41-yard TD
videos.description: Darrin  Hall gets pittsburgh on the board as he gets free for a 41-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Virginia answers as Perkins finds Jana for 42-yard TD
videos.description: Bryce Perkins throws a strike to Terrell Jana for a 42-yard Virginia touchdown.

videos.headline: Pitt's Hall powers in 2nd TD of the game
videos.description: Darrin  Hall puts Pittsburgh ahead as he punches in a 2-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Pitt's Hall gallops in his 3rd TD of the game
videos.description: Pittsburgh's Darrin Hall continues to dominate as he dashes up the middle for a 75-yard touchdown, his third of the day.
